life_insurance.needs_analysis_notes: Test needs to put $125,000 of life insuranc ein place to cover mortgage repayments in the event of death and replace income

sections.assumptions: This advice assumes: excluded products are not currently required or suitable; premiums quoted are estimates subject to underwriting; client's circumstances may change requiring review.
sections.client_priorities: Client priorities identified: obtain appropriate insurance coverage; balance protection with affordability
sections.disclosures: This advice is based on information provided and current legislation. Insurance products have exclusions, limitations, and terms that affect coverage. Premiums may vary from quotes based on underwriting. Tax implications should be considered. Seek independent advice if uncertain.
sections.in_scope: No insurance products are currently being advised on based on the assessment.
sections.limitations: No specific limitations have been identified that restrict the scope of insurance advice.
sections.next_steps: Review insurance needs annually or when circumstances change. Contact adviser if situation changes requiring insurance coverage.
sections.out_of_scope: The following products are not included in this advice based on needs analysis: Life Insurance, Income Protection, Trauma Cover, Health Insurance, Total Permanent Disability (TPD), ACC Top-Up. These exclusions are based on factors detailed in the limitations section.
sections.replacements: No existing insurance products are being recommended for replacement.
sections.summary: After reviewing the financial situation and insurance needs for the client, no insurance products are being recommended at this time. This decision is based on current circumstances including existing coverage, financial position, and identified limitations.
sections.what_is_not_covered: Not covered under this advice: private medical treatment costs; loss of income due to disability; death benefit for beneficiaries. Clients should consider self-insurance or alternative arrangements for these risks.
